backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing click counts in a map with functions to record clicks and query individual or all counts.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented PWA splash screen, iOS startup image tags, and service worker precache features with related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styling and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color systems and global element rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, icons, manifest, and iOS splash screen startup-image links.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styled layout and auto-reload logic when connection returns.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching shell assets, splash images, and offline page using cache-first and navigation fallback strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling all sections, navigation scroll logic, search integration, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/BoostlyLink.tsx: Displays the current site URL with a button to copy it to the clipboard, showing temporary feedback when copied.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and copyright info.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with marketing text, action buttons, an illustration, and an embedded BoostlyLink component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Simple layout wrapper providing a full-height flex container around child content.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with search, scroll-based styling, and mobile sheet menu for navigating site sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/BroadTo: Section that lists broad content guidance topics as cards with icons, descriptions, disclaimers, and tips.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Displays content-type guidance cards with category badges, descriptions, optional disclaimers, and tip lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders growth tips and checklists using cards, icons, and mapped content data.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays FAQ items in an accordion using mapped site content.
frontend/src/components/sections/GetBoos: Shows PWA install options, status messages, and a callout for video lessons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Payment: Provides Cash App monetization UI with click tracking, alerts, and payment link handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Shows platform-specific growth tips with icon tabs and detailed card content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Subscri: Displays subscription plans with selectable options, features, and click-tracked payment links.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Renders a resources section with categorized tool lists and icons using cards and badges.
frontend/src/components/sections/VideoLe: Displays video lesson cards with platform-specific styling, tags, and watch functionality.
frontend/src/components/SiteSearch.tsx: Search input with autocomplete results, keyboard navigation, and callbacks for selecting items.
frontend/src/config/cashAppLinks.ts: Exports the configured Cash App payment URL for linking to payment pages.
frontend/src/config/paymentContactNote.t: Defines a post‑payment contact note configuration with message, link, and a helper to check if it’s set.
frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts: Maps monthly and annual subscription links to the Cash App payment URL.
Provides structured guidance items for broad content topics with tips, keywords, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/content/contentTypeGuidance: Contains guidance items for specific content types including descriptions, tips, keywords, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Exports growth tips and checklists covering profile optimization, content strategy, consistency, engagement, and analytics.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines interfaces and static tip/FAQ content for multiple social platforms, used for search indexing and UI display.
frontend/src/content/videoLessons.ts: Provides a typed list of video lesson metadata including titles, descriptions, tags, and optional URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, session loading, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentClickCounts: Fetches and updates payment button click counts via the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA install prompts, tracking installability and triggering the install flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Simple wrapper exposing the backend actor and fetch state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, typography, utility classes, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing QueryClient and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/search/scrollAndHighlight.t: Provides smooth scrolling to an element and applies a temporary highlight effect for search navigation.
frontend/src/search/searchIndex.ts: Builds a unified search index from various content types and provides functions to tokenize text and return matches for user queries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme utilities.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, goals, architectural notes, image requirements, and existing features for the Boostly app and website.
